::Surgital/Triggerhappy/Cutthroat/Skullgrin::

     Surgital got hit in the=
 back, and turned around in fury to look at Greven.  With another blade reg=
rown in his right hand, he lifted it, and then sent the saw blade from his =
hand quickly at Greven's shoulder.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~
       Triggerhappy dodged one missile but the other hit the ground and=
 exploded near him, and sent him flying into a boulder.  He got up, then tr=
ansformed to jet mode, and darted up into the air, towards Astral, attempti=
ng to ram Astral.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Cutt=
hroat flew out of the way of the grenades.  He flew around searching for an=
other target, as the jet went out of his sights.  Cutthroat shot a stream o=
f fire from his beak down at Hun-Grr, mistaking him for a Maximal from how =
high up he was.
